timeline.title: Software Engineer II
timeline.description: Lead front-end for a stealth mode startup, developing open-source projects with the company.

description.US: Developing an automated passive-income soccer analytical engine.
description.GB: Developing an automated passive-income football analytical engine, which estimates the probability of a player joining another team.

parts.title: Hybrid Mobile Developer
parts.description: Developed the Shipt native mobile (iOS and Android) app alongside five brilliant senior engineers.

description.US: Shipt's first web developer (really!). Built the Shipt web app from scratch in React with Redux.
description.GB: Lead web developer at Shipt, a $500M tech startup. Built the Shipt web app in React with Redux.

timeline.title: Teaching Assistant
timeline.description: Provided academic support to the students taking the Web Development course, including marking assignments and helping in class.

timeline.title: Full Stack Web Developer
timeline.description: Created JavaScript apps at a seed stage social media tech startup.

timeline.title: Technology Analyst
timeline.description: Summer internship developing trading infrastructure code.

timeline.title: Freelance Developer
timeline.description: My job outside of my job. About 25 clients and counting.

timeline.thesis: Development of a fast client-side Markdown compiler written in JavaScript
